title: CS Competency Practical Enhancement: Inquiry-Based Instructional Design for Inclusive Early Childhood STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational early childhood education theory and understanding of STEM education concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more instructional strategies for designing STEM inquiry activities that accommodate diverse learner needs.
Learners can complete a project portfolio that designs inclusive learning environments using low-tech and no-tech tools.
Learners can develop early childhood STEM learning assessment tools through multimodal engagement (coding, art, role-playing, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
